title: Exposed
description: DeliaKyle Walker, MMA fighter at Sin City, and my new client. Wow! He is sex on a stick. That man is going to leave me breathless and needy just from his touch. But I don’t date clients, been there done that and got burned... badly. Why does he have to be a client?KyleDelia Campbell, how do I work with this woman when I can’t get her body out of my mind? All I want to do is hear her scream my name. Dancing with her, holding her in my arms is driving me crazy. But, she turns me down at every turn, how do I convince her to take a chance?
author: Ember-Raine Winters
